channel.title: Making Money with Scour
channel.description:
Hello, everyone. I found this site where you can earn money (or better said "electronic visa cards") to search for anything. The cool part is that there is an auto-search machine which can do all the work for you.
You can signup here: http://scour.com/
After you signup confirm your e-mail and you are all set. If you click on "redeem" you will see this (this pic is not from my account i just found it already online so i put the link - - there is no difference, just the points):
[IMG]http://i137.photobucket.com/albums/q219/ajjr1228/d373d806.jpg[/img]
This means that when you get the required points, you can cash out (takes 2-4 days) and the payment is an electronic Visa charged with the given amount, that you can use anywhere like regular Visa.
Another thing to mention is that you don't need to have Paypal or AlertPay or anything like that, not even a credit card. Your payment is a credit card itself.
Now, to download Blackhat Scour (auto-search machine) go here: http://rapidshare.com/files/244840081/Scour_2.3.7.zip (scan if you like)
After you download it edit the "settings.ini" and put your scour username and password. there's a max of 100 searches a day, cause if you could do it all in 1 day these people would be in bankruptcy
I hope you all enjoy it. Please sign up under my referral link if you liked this tutorial.
http://scour.com/invite/ajjr1228/

item.title: Making Money with Scour
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

After some research, I found out they ban all accounts that are linked to botting, obviously, and no one has ever gotten a payout with this bot. Also, the author has discontinued it.

U GUYZ R WASTIN YO TIME.

Read full topic

I got 400 points yesterday alone.

item.title: Making Money with Scour
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

the bank:

Correct me if I’m wrong, but if you can only do 100 per day, then it will take 65 days just to get $25…

You can get 300 points per days.
3 per search, if you use proxy and make new accounts as you refferals you can get a WoW or Runescape subscription, or some beers.

Read full topic

not if you comment the relativity and say if it was a good search. max a day you can get is 300 excluding from friends.

EDIT: The auto-searcher thing doesn’t work on WINE

p.s. EDIT: It gives you points for every search, cannot confirm if it gives you cards though ??
